body.p:
Verify all Lug connections are tight. In the event that any loose connections are found during the installation of the unit, please contact Eaton Service (1-800-843-9433).
Check the main input connections at the main breakers and the bypass breakers to be sure vibration have not loosened the terminal screws.
In the same manner, check the feeders running from the load side of the input and bypass breakers.
Check the feeders running to the output circuit breaker or output switch.
Check all lugs for tightness on the following:
\Neutral Bus
Ground Bus
Bus bars
Circuit breakers
SCR switch modules
